title: White asparagus and smoked salmon salad
ingredients: ['1kg white asparagus', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', 'pinch of granulated sugar', '1 tablespoon butter', '200g smoked salmon', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '6 tablespoons olive oil', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 bunch fresh dill, minced']
